title: Meta-Error: Failed to Log Documentation Error in Knowledge Graph
description: After fixing incorrect Humanitix API documentation, failed to immediately log the error and solution in Knowledge Graph. This violates the core principle of the Knowledge Graph system - capturing ALL mistakes to prevent repetition. Only logged it after user pointed out the failure. This meta-error shows a pattern of not using the Knowledge Graph system consistently.

solution.description: Immediately logged both the original Humanitix documentation error and this meta-error to Knowledge Graph. Reinforced the critical practice: ALWAYS log errors and solutions immediately after resolution, not just when explicitly asked. Every mistake, no matter how small, must be captured to prevent repetition across Claude sessions.
